title: LED Blinker Circuit
desc: A timing-based LED circuit that turns LEDs ON and OFF using resistors, capacitors, and a switching element such as a 555 timer.
modalLearn: Building RC timing circuits and LED drivers.
Understanding how 555 timer output cycles operate.
Simulating the blink behavior in TinkerCAD and designing PCB traces in KiCAD.

title: Power Bank Circuit
desc: A rechargeable power system that uses a Li-ion battery and a boost converter to supply a stable 5V USB output.
modalLearn: How boost converters increase voltage from 3.7V to 5V.
Battery management, charging, and protection principles.
Designing and routing power circuits in KiCAD.

title: Street Light Sensor System
desc: An automatic lighting system that uses an LDR to detect ambient light level and control street lights without manual switching.
modalLearn: How LDR resistance changes with varying light levels.
Comparator or microcontroller-based switching.
Simulating sensing logic and creating PCB schematics.

title: Motion Detector Circuit
desc: A motion-sensing circuit that uses PIR or IR sensors to detect movement and trigger an alarm or lighting output.
modalLearn: Understanding PIR sensor detection mechanisms.
Triggering alarms using digital sensor outputs.
Designing and routing sensor modules in KiCAD.

title: Energy Consumption Monitor
desc: A system that measures voltage, current, and power to calculate total energy consumption in real-time.
modalLearn: How current sensors like ACS712 measure load current.
Computing energy usage (Wh) from voltage and current.
PCB layout for sensing circuits with noise reduction.

title: Fire Detection Alarm
desc: A fire safety circuit that detects smoke or heat levels using sensors and triggers alarms automatically.
modalLearn: Reading sensor thresholds for smoke and heat.
Designing automatic buzzer trigger logic.
Testing alarm systems and drawing PCB layouts.

title: Traffic Light Controller
desc: A signal control system that cycles through RED, GREEN, and YELLOW lights based on timing logic.
modalLearn: Creating timing sequences for LED switching.
Implementing real traffic control algorithms.
Simulating the light cycle logic and designing PCBs.

title: Transformer Monitoring System
desc: A monitoring setup that tracks transformer temperature, load current, and critical operating conditions to prevent failures.
modalLearn: How thermistors and digital temperature sensors work.
Current sensing and overload detection.
Designing transformer protection circuits and dashboards.
